title: Washington AG Takes Trump to Court over Immigration (Audio)
itunes:title: Washington AG Takes Trump to Court over Immigration (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Lynette Parker, a professor at Santa Clara University, discusses a lawsuit against Donald Trump’s executive order on immigration, which was brought by the Attorney General of Washington State. She speaks with June Grasso on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
